 For Mac Android Studio

 cmd + D Duplicate focused line on next line
 double Shift Search entire project
 cmd + F Search on focused file
 cmd + shift + L/R Highlight entire line
 cmd + shift + U/D Move line
 alt + U/D Highlight from inside tag out. alt + cmd + o Remove unused imports ctrl + alt + l Line spacing
